title: A Moment of Reckoning (and Renewed Popularity) for R. Kelly | Malala Yousafzai
itunes:title: A Moment of Reckoning (and Renewed Popularity) for R. Kelly | Malala Yousafzai
description:
The U.S. government shutdown enters its third week, Roy Wood Jr. examines R. Kelly's surge in popularity, and Malala Yousafzai discusses "We Are Displaced" and Malala Fund. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
